sentences.en: Armed with a stouthearted spirit, the little boy was able to knock the giant down.
sentences.cn: 小男孩用刚毅的精神鼓舞自己，然后把巨人打倒了。

sentences.en: Of course you also need others' understanding, conciliation and support. But even at this moment, you're so silent, so peaceful, so stouthearted and so respectable!
sentences.cn: 你又何尝不需要他人的理解、抚慰和支持，而这时你却是如此沉默、恬静、刚毅而令人肃然起敬！

sentences.en: So we women should be strong like iron when we work, look ourselves as men, decidedly, manfully, stouthearted The idiosyncracy we appear in the work should be like this.
sentences.cn: 所有女人在工作中要像钢铁一样坚强，把自己当成男人，果断，刚毅。这就是我们工作中该呈现出的特质。
